channel.title: Run Server Error Need Help
channel.description: Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size. Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Run Server Error Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Learning_Code Learning Code
item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

If you have a low RAM computer, change that value to -Xmx256m or -Xmx512m

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error Need Help
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

[quote=“stino2121, post:1, topic:543179”]Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096m
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You’re obviously putting too much memory into it. Try changing it to -Xmx1024m

Read full topic

item.title: Run Server Error Need Help
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

You’re allocating more memory than allowable. Try using a smaller value.

Read full topic
